column1: Flói was a Dwarves of Lonely Mountain.
Flói was a member of Balins Colony who tried to reclaim Moria in .  When they reached the Mirrormere
column2: there was a great battle. Flói was valorous
column3: but was killed by a Goblin arrow.

column2: he was buried under the grass near the Mirrormere. His death was recorded in the Book of Mazarbul.
